channel.title: disappearance, constitution, [[incapacitated]], suffocating on

item.description: [[Dust of Sneezing and Choking]] Wondrous item, uncommon Found in a small container, this powder resembles very fine sand. It appears to be dust of disappearance, and an identify spell reveals it to be such.
